name: Mystique Soup
desc: A drink made from Grainfruit. The cup is full of still, bright liquid, with the magnificent hues of a gemstone with a stunning gradient. Its subtle fragrance and delicate sweetness combine to evoke the mysteries of an ancient tribe, leaving those that partake yearning for more.

customize.name: Recipe: Mystique Soup
customize.desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Mystique Soup.

customize.name: Delicious Mystique Soup
customize.desc: A drink made from Grainfruit. The cup is full of still, bright liquid, with the magnificent hues of a gemstone with a stunning gradient. Its subtle fragrance and delicate sweetness combine to evoke the mysteries of an ancient tribe, leaving those that partake yearning for more.

customize.name: Suspicious Mystique Soup
customize.desc: A drink made from Grainfruit. One sip and all your taste buds begin to tingle. It's almost like an "endless aftertaste," for the flavor is so intense that it lingers on the tip of your tongue, and even drinking water cannot wash it away.

customize.name: Mystique Soup
customize.desc: A drink made from Grainfruit. The cup is full of still, bright liquid, with the magnificent hues of a gemstone with a stunning gradient. Its subtle fragrance and delicate sweetness combine to evoke the mysteries of an ancient tribe, leaving those that partake yearning for more.

customize.name: Grainfruit
customize.desc: This plant is named after the giant grains that grow along the cob.

customize.name: Embercore Flower
customize.desc: A strange flower that can be found all over the plains and highlands. Mature buds will bloom after being hit.

customize.name: Sugar
customize.desc: A seasoning derived from Sweet Flowers. Has the power to give both energy and happiness.

customize.name: Jam
customize.desc: A gelatinous substance made from fruit and sugar. Even a little bit can easily wake up tired taste buds.

value.text:
A little surprise from the Masters of the Night-Wind.
Regenerates 1 HP to the selected character every 8s for 40s and displays the logo of the Masters of the Night-Wind. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).
